=AAUltraByte=AA


   "To the pit, What has that slagging Megatron done now.=
"  UltraByte 
said as he stood up from where he was laying.  He was in his =
personal 
room.  Nothing was really all messed up in there because he packe=
d 
all of his belongings in the closet.

   He started Walking towards the =
Bridge.  Why He was walking he 
thought to himself, 'Should I challenge Meg=
atron for command now or 
wait till I have more supporters.'  UltraByte fin=
ally decided that if 
Megs was weak then he would challenge and if Megs was=
 strong then 
Megs wouldn't have a challenge.  UltraByte entered the Bridge=
 or the 
remains of the Bridge.
